          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_b5d235455982f66c96fe5260778dd619de42b696</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear processes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernprozesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Processus nucléaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Processos nucleares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Processi nucleari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρηνικές διαδικασίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Procesos nucleares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that nuclear fission and nuclear fusion are both processes which increase the binding energy per nucleon of the particles involved.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear process</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nucleon number</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Kernspaltung und 
Kernfusion beide Prozesse sind, die die Bindungsenergie pro Nukleon 
der betroffenen Partikel erhöhen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que la fission 
nucléaire et la fusion nucléaire sont les deux processus qui 
augmentent l'énergie de liaison par nucléon des particules 
impliquées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que o fission nuclear
e a fusão nuclear são ambos os processos que aumentam a energia 
obrigatória por o núcleon das partículas envolvidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che la fissione 
nucleare e la fusione nucleare sono entrambi i processi che aumentano 
l'energia di legame per il nucleone delle particelle in questione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι η πυρηνική 
διάσπαση και η πυρηνική τήξη είναι και οι δύο διαδικασίες που 
αυξάνουν την ενέργεια συσχετισμών ανά nucleon των μορίων 
σχετικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que la fisión 
nuclear y la fusión nuclear son ambos procesos que aumentan la 
energía de enlace por el nucleón de las partículas implicadas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
